announcements.title: Launcher v2.2.0 Released
body: This update brings highly requested system features and UI improvements:
- **System Tray Integration:** The launcher now minimizes to the tray to keep your games up to date in the background
- **Smart Background Behavior:** Added options for 'Start on Startup', 'Start Minimized', and 'Close to Tray' (Can be configured in the settings)
- **Desktop Notifications:** Get notified about new game releases, game updates, and launcher updates
- **Settings Redesign:** Reorganized the Settings page for better readability
- **Visual Polish:** Moved the Launcher Update check to the top for better visibility and updated UI elements

announcements.title: Everdew v0.3.4 Released
body: Everdew has been updated to version 0.3.4!
This update includes small additions and fixes:
- Added a fullscreen toggle in the pause menu
- Added a resolution dropdown in the pause menu
- Made the transition from main menu to game smoother
